function topScores(uint256) view returns (address player, uint256 score, bytes32 nickname)
function getLeaderboard() view returns (address[10] players, uint256[10] scores, bytes32[10] nicknames)
function getWeeklyLeaderboard(uint256 weekId) view returns (address[10] players, uint256[10] scores, bytes32[10] nicknames)
function getMonthlyLeaderboard(uint256 monthId) view returns (address[10] players, uint256[10] scores, bytes32[10] nicknames)
event ScoreSubmitted(address indexed player, uint256 score, bytes32 nickname, bool isNewRecord)
